title: Technoidentity | Offer Evaluations | Hyderabad
content:
College : Tier 3
Years of Experience: 4 
Prior Experience: Amazon SDE
Previous Compensation - 25 LPA

Date of the Offer : March 2024
Company : Technoidentity
Title/Level : Software Engineer(React)
Location : Hyderbad
Base : 32 Lakh(All Fixed)
Total comp : 32 LPA

Please evaluate this offer. It is from a service-based company based in Hyderabad. I need to know if it's a good offer, what the work-life balance is like, how the growth opportunities are, and whether they have sufficient clients or if they terminate employees once they are on the bench.
